name: A strange amount
description:
You need to calculate a strange amount: 

s=sqrt(n) * (cos(0 * 2pi/n)+cos(1 * 2pi/n)+cos(2 * 2pi/n) + ... + cos(n * 2pi/n))

Where 2pi is equal to 6.2831853071...

Attention! n can be very large (5<=n<=1000000000)

You need to calculate the answer with an accuracy of +-1%
